page.title: 01OUR AREA
page.content:
Our area includes the North Suffolk villages of Stoke Ash (part),Thwaite , Wickham Skeith and Brockford. The area is mostly farmland all the rest is villages . The houses are mostly in the villages. There is a big main road the A140 which runs beetween Ipswich and Norwich . There is a large pond in Wickham Skeith, called the Grimmer, which is in the centre of the village.
Summary of Main Features ------------------------- A140 - Trunk road. Was a Roman road. The Grimmer - A large village pond. Farmland - Mostly arable Some dairy farms. Commuting - several people live here and travel to work in Stowmarket, Diss, Eye, Ipswich and other places.
